did.unittitle: Untitled short story (p. 1-27, probably not complete)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Heavily edited. First line: It was some seconds before he awakened. Still sleeping, his head jerked upward, and he sat a moment, rigid.... Characters: High Pockets Copenhaver, Sil, Marthie. Unknown whether this story relates, if at all, to the untitled sections in Folders 35 and 36.
